title: Lord Of The Rings Theatrical 2001-2003 1080p Rifftrax 6ch 2ch v2
description:
Lord.Of.The.Rings.Theatrical.2001-2003.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2

LOTR1.Fellowship.Of.The.Ring.Theatrical.2001.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2.mkv
LOTR2.Two.Towers.Theatrical.2002.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2.mkv
LOTR3.Return.Of.The.King.Theatrical.2003.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS RIFFTRAX
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK3 FOR 2.0

THESE ARE THE THEATRICAL RELEASES (NOT E X T E N D E D)

The Fellowship of the Ring Theatrical Edition (2001)
Rifftrax released 2006.11.21 2hour58min25sec 4,893,573,114bytes
Riffers: Kevin Murphy, Mike Nelson www.imdb.com/title/tt0120737/

The Two Towers Theatrical Edition (2002)
Rifftrax released 2008.05.23 2hour59min25sec 4,858,014,116bytes
Riffers: Bill Corbett, Kevin Murphy, Mike Nelson www.imdb.com/title/tt0167261/

The Return of the King Theatrical Edition (2003)
Rifftrax released 2010.06.22 3hour21min2sec 4,961,933,776bytes
Riffers: Bill Corbett, Kevin Murphy, Mike Nelson www.imdb.com/title/tt0167260/
The Rifftones song "Ghan-Buri-Ghan" is after the intro comments during the credits

movie: FellowshipOfTheRing TwoTowers ReturnOfTheKing
video: 1920x800 AVC 2805Kbps 2745Kbps 2438Kbps
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0 193Kbps 193Kbps 193Kbps
audio2: just movie AAC 5.1 402Kbps 409Kbps 401Kbps (unprocessed)
audio3: just movie AAC 2.0 253Kbps 256Kbps 252Kbps (unprocessed)
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
subs: English for some Elvish hard coded (as per DVD and Blu-Ray disc releases)

This version2 has the following changes:
* newly remastered 2.0 Riff track using Chris's Dynamic Compressor on the movie and Level Speech on the riffs
* new 2.0 Riff audio audio track has more balanced and understandable riff and movie dialog
* the volume range for the riffs is much, much more consistent so even very quiet riff words are clear
* v1 had many manual adjustments: Fellowship 15, Towers 12, Return 43
* with v2 the riffs did not need manual adjustment since the Level Speech effect did a much better job than the manual tweaking
* the v2 movie audio has better fidelity, especially in loud parts
* the quietest movie dialog is now louder and easier to hear
* v2 2.0 Riff is 193Kbps vs v1 at 165Kbps
* as with v1, the 5.1 Movie and 2.0 Movie audio tracks are unprocessed
* v2 has Advanced SSA subs instead of v1's UTF-8 Plain Text subs
* bracketed subs like "[In Elvish]" were removed since they sometimes interfered with the hard Elvish subs
* other bracketed Hearing Impaired subtitles were also removed

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/5.1 encodes of the movies, the subs and the chapters.
